text: 17.3: Ru 24.26; FG 3.18; 9.22; 18.28; Ga 3.1Ana Fhe Bakɨmen bunin vhuuin mbe khɨvav mbe nzuav, ana Fhe Bakɨmen bunin vhuuiŋ nɨɨŋge bun mbe nzuav khaŋ nzuai, “Mba Fhe Bakɨme taagip wo gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav farasarigi guma, ana fharav zaa ndiv, rimgip, taagip khavgirga.” Por nen mbe nzuav khaŋ nzuai, “Gu mba Zisasra, gu khar ana buni vhuuiŋ bun nde nzuai. Mba gumara, Fhe Bakɨme taagip wo gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav ana farasarigi.”
